statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Given a positive integer N, your task is to calculate the sum of the positive integers less than N which are not coprime to N. A is said to be coprime to B if A, B share no common positive divisors except 1.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: For each test case, there is a line containing a positive integer N(1 ≤ N ≤ 1000000000). A line containing a single 0 follows the last test case.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, you should print the sum module 1000000007 in a line.
